name: Ritz
nutshell: This is story about Saki author Kobayashi Ritz, who revolutionized the world of mahjong manga with her mix of "moe" and "mahjong".

name: Cassandra
nutshell: A gripping reinterpretation/adaptation of The Illiad by Homer that revolves around Priam's daughter, Cassandra, who was believed to have been given the gift of prophecy by Apollo when he proposed to her.

name: Kiichi!! VS
nutshell:
Second arc of Kiichi!!, taking place 10 years after the events of volume 9.
Ever more uncompromising in the face of injustice, Kiichi has become a star. Known around the world for shaking the Japanese establishment, he doesn't intend to stop there. Now at the head of a big company, between school of thought and mafia, whose members number in the thousands, he wants once again to get the population moving, even if it means provoking the powerful of the country!

name: A-bout!! - Asagiri Daikatsuyaku Hen
nutshell: Asagiri's second year at Mitsumine.

name: Aikatsu! - Donkan de, wagamama na. (Douijinshi)
nutshell:
Pairings: Kaede x Yurika, Ran x Yurika
Link:
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon

name: Fan Robot Hated by Everyone Brings a Gyaru Back to Life
nutshell:
The story about a dejected, humanoid robot with a fan for a head.
A Fan bot who doesn't have Fans except for one Only Fans

name: Maboroshi Koi Kitan
nutshell:
They suffer between Love and Duties.
From thrilling Kunoichi comedy to the distress of a poisonous French queen, master Kamata Kimiko transcends time and space and brings you stories about delicate, earnest and sturdy maidens!
Includes several stories, all based loosely on other works:

Swan Ninja Art Anecdotes (Swan Lake, ballet)
Edo Love Dance (Carmen, opera)
DOLL (Nutcracker, ballet)
Lace Promise (the life of Catherine de Medici)
Arisu (Alice's Adventures in Wonderland)

name: Weeping Insect
nutshell:
Approaching the end of its life, a cicada can do nothing but weep.
—
A pixiv oneshot by Hoshinoshita Yuki. English translation provided by Luna Lotus with the author's permission.

name: Arcadia
nutshell: In the year 2417, an asteroid the size of the moon is on a collision course with Earth. We don't have the ability to stop it, but we are able to evacuate a large amount of the population. A few planets had been discovered that were believed to be habitable for our race…Arcadia is one of them.

name: Saya
nutshell:
Akira, a high-schooler, is the current head of the Tsurugi house, which has been known for its abilities in eliminating violent gods and other spirits.
After successfully finishing a job at a dangerously haunted construction site he casually finds one of his classmates in the red light district, where she is assaulted by demons. He draws his sword Raiteimaru to protect her, but the sword breaks...

name: Koi ga Odoru New Town
nutshell: After trying and failing to confess to his crush Amekawa-kun in middle school, shy and introverted Iishima thinks that if only he were cute like a girl, he too would be able to express his love to the guy he likes. Flashforward several years and Iishima's working part-time as a crossdresser, something that's both enjoyable and empowering for him. But then he finds out that Rina-san, his crossdressing colleague, is none other than Amekawa-kun!

name: Sheikh no Ryakudatsu Ai
nutshell:
Wife–rescued and paid for!
Kidnapped by rebels, Belle Winters discovers her rescuer is Rafiq al Akhtar, Sovereign Prince of the desert kingdom of Q'aroum. Whisked away to his exotic palace, Rafiq expects her to show her gratitude…by marrying him!
Rafiq demands Belle perform all her royal duties–both in public and in private. Soon she succumbs to the sultry heat of the desert and to Rafiq's seduction. Belle is no longer an unwilling wife, now she is the sheikh's very willing lover….
Surrender To The Sheikh: He's proud, passionate, primal–dare she surrender to the Sheikh?

name: What I Want to Do to The Cheeky Little Brat
nutshell: A oneshot uploaded to pixiv by Yanagida Fumita.

name: Silent Lover
nutshell:
The cruel and lecherous prince x The meek and mute servant.
The Prince of Zhen Bei has his eyes set on the gold and riches of the Chen Family, and wants to take their daughter as a side concubine. In order to reassure his adoptive mother in her old age, the mute, male servant Chen Yu conceals his gender and takes the place of the daughter to be sent to Prince Zhen Bei. Chen Yu is afraid that once his identity is found he would lose his life, but without his knowledge he attracts the attention of Jun Xuanxiao…

name: Onii-chan wa Se ga Chiisai
nutshell: Natsuki Amano is a super ordinary junior high girl. But her dad's newly wed wife's son is a hottie who's going to stay with her?! Her heart is pounding, thinking that her life is developing into some drama, but her new brother would up being… super short?!

name: Princess
nutshell: Kokona, daughter from the Eda family, and Hiro, the son of Kawai family, who has been serving as bodyguard her family for many generations, were engaged by their parents. She likes him. He seems to feel no feelings towards her.

name: Chiisana Mori no Ookami-chan
nutshell:
There's a small forest on the edge of town. People have long feared the forest after being told not to enter it, for they may not ever return. The reason: there's a scary wolf there…!?
This is a story of a gentle and hardworking wulf living together with the other forest animals.

Alternative raw: seiga.nicovideo

name: IF
nutshell:
What if your friends and family suddenly disappear in an instant? What if those not taken in the Rapture become insane and threaten others' lives?
How would those who have survived adapt to their new circumstances? Do they have what it takes to save those in trouble and start a brand new world?

Links:

Raw Season 1
Raw Season 2

name: Kokodake no Himitsu
nutshell: Mari Kurusu has had a crush on Kuro Rouzen (the weird guy in her class) for quite a while and when he eats her love letter she thinks it means rejection. Later she finds out his secret, that he is part of a top-secret organization that protects the humans of Earth and he brings her back to the organization to erase her memories. But for some reason, the organization choose's not to erase her memory…

name: King & Prince - King & Prince in Summer (Doujinshi)
Tokuitaishitsu-kei Joshi no Hanashi
nutshell: Kotoha is an average girl in love with a less-than-average condition: all of her thoughts come out of her body as physical letters! While the condition can be both a blessing (such as when thinking about food) and a curse, she has learned to keep her thoughts to herself until she can get home and "vent" in peace. But when a chance conversation with her crush, Kou, causes her weird letter-producing ability to go into overdrive, Kotoha kisses her high-school life goodbye. Will she finally get a chance with him, or will her idiosyncrasy​ send him running?

name: Splatter Sister
nutshell: Sana Tsukimori is a 10 year old horror star but she can't grab the attention of her older brother.

name: The Golden Trunk
nutshell:
One night, a mysterious man carrying a golden trunk books a room at the hotel. Many pursue the trunk, and the contents inside it. What is inside is it?
An early gekiga work of Tezuka, serialized in a newspaper.

Volume 58 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Bombingsu
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Comedy,Magic,Girls' Love,School Life,Fantasy,Full Color

name: Sword Dancer
nutshell: Golden-haired and blue-eyed Heilong is the clan's most powerful and fearsome assasin; however, he left the group with his blind best friend, Pailong. Nowadays, the two of them are doing street dance performances, but the clan continues to hunt for them… to bring Heilong back!

name: Monsutā ni hentai suru osananajimi
nutshell:
Shunpei's childhood friend, Ayari, keeps turning into different forms of monsters.

Artist's Pixiv
Artist's Twitter

name: Psycho Revenge
nutshell:
Sungbin was ordinary, but after the death of his sister, he takes on the moniker of 'Neon Mask'. As Neon Mask, he becomes a psycho streamer and wages war on all gangs.
"A debt of blood must be paid back in blood."
"To avenge my sister, I will create an ocean of blood."
Official Thai

name: Siwoldeu Fantasy
nutshell:
Jorace, the warrior on the road to success.
Marriage with an unidentified, super-cool handsome man has come.
By the way... the mother-in-law is a big. ㄴ(°0°)ㄱ

name: Marvelous Melmo
nutshell:
A fantasy story for kids featuring a girl named Melmo, who can change her age as she wishes by eating special candies.
Melmo's mother dies in a traffic accident, leaving young Melmo and her younger brother Totoo. Anxious, Melmo's mother in heaven asks God to prepare some magical candies, and hands them to Melmo.
There are two kinds: Melmo can grow 10 years older to become any sort of adult she wishes by eating a blue candy. By eating a red one, she can become 10 years younger.
Using these miracle candies, Melmo disguises herself as a nurse, schoolteacher, policewoman, and overcomes troubles together with her brother, Totoo.

Volume 280 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Bite Marks
nutshell:
A story about Ichigo and her oblivious(?) childhood friend, his terrible sleeping habits and his bite marks.
Artist’s Twitter
Artist’s Pixiv
